data.title: Kyle Kavanaugh on LinkedIn: Favorite Austin restaurant debuts in Montrose's hottest hub with…
data.meta_description: Congrats to Picnik Restaurants, Radom Capital and Steve Radom on a successful partnership in getting Picnik to the Houston market. What’s next for both?
data.text:
Main + Main Inc. is delighted to introduce Hannah Rogers! With an impressive career trajectory in Commercial Real Estate, Hannah is a remarkable talent who brings a wealth of expertise and a vibrant professional background to our team. Hannah embarked on her journey in Commercial Real Estate at a regional firm, where she advised and partnered with esteemed brands such as LA Fitness, 7-Eleven, In-N-Out, Macy's, Albertson's, and many more. Her experience encompasses both tenant representation and collaborations with regional and national landlords, demonstrating her versatility in navigating the complexities of the industry. Before venturing into the real estate arena, Hannah earned her Business Administration and Psychology degree from Arizona State University. Along with complementing her academic achievements, she boasts four years of invaluable experience in the hospitality and customer service sector, acquired while working for a prominent national retailer. Hannah's expertise in the commercial real estate space and her personal insight into the national retail world make her a formidable addition to our ever-evolving Main + Main family. We look forward to the fresh insights, dynamic solutions, and unparalleled dedication she will bring to our team and, most importantly, to our clients.

EDENS and Main + Main, Inc. forge a strategic retail partnership to revitalize Alamo Plaza. Alamo, California – June 22, 2023 – EDENS, a leading national retail real estate developer and operator has partnered with Main + Main, Inc., a prominent authority in commercial retail leasing advisory, to reimagine and revitalize the Alamo Plaza project in Northern California’s Bay Area. Main + Main, Inc. has been handpicked to spearhead the leasing efforts for this redevelopment project and to enrich the local community through meticulous curation of retail partners combined with inclusive spaces where people can connect, shop, and dine. Alamo Plaza Shopping Center, located between Walnut Creek and Danville, serves as the preeminent shopping destination in the community and will benefit from its reach to the adjacent communities. Both partners are thrilled to be a vital component of this exciting opportunity to bring an unparalleled retail experience to the community of Alamo. “We are excited to partner with a “best in class” retail real estate owner, operator and developer such as EDENS, that is truly focused on bringing quality retail experiences to the Alamo community.” - Kyle Kavanaugh, CEO, Main + Main, Inc.

We are thrilled to announce the recent addition of Kelley Maher to the Main + Main, Inc. team! Kelley is a seasoned leasing professional with over 30 years of deal making experience and has enjoyed working coast to coast for some of the most respected and progressive companies in the retail industry. Clients have included Fortune 500 Companies, Financial Institutions and Pension Funds to lease all disciplines of retail from small boutique retailers in neighborhood centers to department stores in regional malls. Kelley is a team player, collectively strategizing to establish merchandising plans, promotions and budgets to accomplish the goals of leasing to occupiers that create synergy with the overall mix and traffic drivers to a center.

Our industry needed the Main + Main party to come back to ICSC maybe as much as America needed their football…maybe more. Thanks Kyle Kavanaugh and the rest of the team for being a great host and happy 25yrs to Main + Main Inc. Great seeing everyone who we met with and cheers’d us at The Seaker Group.
